headline: Marathon Galveston Bay Refinery hydrotreater to remain shut until September, sources say
summary: A fire-damaged hydrotreaterat Marathon Petroleum's Galveston Bay Refinery in Texaswill remain shut until September, sources familiar with plantoperations said on Thursday. All other...
